title: The Ultimate Girl Bonding Getaway
text:
The Ultimate Girl Bonding Getaway
Gather your girlfriends and treat yourselves to a much-needed beach getaway with Discovery Shores Boracays Girlfriend Getaway Package.
Pasig City, Philippines, October 09, 2015 --( PR.com )-- The “Girlfriend Getaway” Package is girl bonding at its best, with a three-day and two-night escape at a suite of your choice inclusive of delightful daily buffet breakfast at Sands Restaurant, a “Tea Time” afternoon treat, an en suite manicure service session, your choice of either a 60-minute massage at the Terra Wellness Spa or Mermaid Swimming lessons, and round trip boat and land transfers from and to the Boracay Airport in Caticlan.
Special package rates start at Php27,800++ (lean season), Php33,800++ (peak season) and Php40,800++ for a Junior Suite.
Relish each sun kissed day at Discovery Shores Boracay’s stunning beachfront with its white sand dunes and crystalline turquoise waters while beach butlers spoil you rotten and anticipate your needs to the detail, with unobtrusive service and immediate attention. Then, enjoy a front-row seat to each breathtaking sunset, not to mention people watching!
The “Girlfriend Getaway” Package will take you to the world’s best so that you can have it all – the sun, the sea, the sky, the most luxurious suite, and Discovery Shores unparalleled “Service that’s all heart.”
For inquiries and reservations, contact Discovery Shores Boracay at (+63 2) 720.8888 / (63 36) 288.4500, email dsbrsvn@discovery.com.ph or visit www.discoveryshoresboracay.com.
Discovery Suites, Discovery Country Suites Tagaytay, and Discovery Shores Boracay are owned and managed by The Discovery Leisure Company.
About Discovery Shores Boracay
Discovery Shores Boracay is an award-winning 88-suite luxury resort in Station 1 of White Beach. The beachfront property features the highly-acclaimed Terra Wellness Spa and well-loved restaurants Sands and Indigo. The resort is consistently listed in Travel + Leisure’s World’s Best Hotels and is a regular awardee on TripAdvisor, while being a member of The Small Luxury Hotels of the World since the property’s opening in 2007.
Discovery Shores Boracay is one of five properties of The Discovery Leisure Company’s portfolio of distinctive hotels and resorts. Get updates through Discovery Shores Boracay’s Facebook on http://facebook.com/DiscoveryShoresBoracay, Instagram @DiscoveryShoresBoracay and Twitter @DiscoveryShores.
